query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DrivingLicence o WHERE o.type = ?1 and o.level = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ServiceInvoice o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Year o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Color o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Color o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Worker o WHERE o.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice2 o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.year, o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice2 o WHERE o.year = ?1 and o.number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.year, o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o._Paid = 'S'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o._Paid <> 'S'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Invoice o WHERE o.year = ?1 and o.number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryDetail o WHERE o._Delivery_invoice_year = ?1 AND o._Delivery_invoice_number = ?2 AND o._Delivery_type_number = ?3 AND o._Delivery_number = ?4 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product3 o WHERE o._Family_oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product3 o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Subfamily2 o WHERE o._Family_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Subfamily2 o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AverageSpeed o WHERE o._Vehicle_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AverageSpeed o WHERE o._Driver_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AverageSpeed o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Subfamily o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Clerk o WHERE o.zoneNumber = ?1 and o.officeNumber = ?2 and o.number = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Warehouse o WHERE o.zoneNumber = ?1 and o._Number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Task o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Family2 o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Service o WHERE o._Invoice_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Service o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Course o WHERE o.year = ?1 and o.number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail2 o WHERE o._Product_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail2 o WHERE o._Invoice2_year = ?1 AND o._Invoice2_number = ?2 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Driver o WHERE o._Type = ?1 AND o._DrivingLicence_level = ?2 ORDER BY o._Number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Driver o WHERE o._Number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ServiceType o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Receptionist o WHERE o._DeliveryPlace_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Receptionist o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AdditionalDetail o WHERE o._Service_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.counter
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AdditionalDetail o WHERE o._Type_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.counter
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office2 o WHERE o.zoneNumber = ?1 AND o.number = ?2 AND o._OfficeManager_number = ?3 ORDER BY o.number, o.zoneNumber
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office2 o WHERE o._DefaultCarrier_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number, o.zoneNumber
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office2 o WHERE o.zoneNumber = ?1 AND o._MainWarehouse_number = ?2 ORDER BY o.number, o.zoneNumber
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Seller_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._AlternateSeller_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Name like ?1 ORDER BY o._Name desc
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Name like ?1 and o._RelationWithSeller = ?2 ORDER BY o._Name desc
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Type = 0
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Type = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o WHERE o._Address_street = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Customer o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o._Type_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o._Shipment_type = ?1 AND o._Shipment_mode = ?2 AND o._Shipment_number = ?3 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o._Carrier_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o WHERE o._Invoice_year = ?1 AND o._Invoice_number = ?2 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Delivery o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FormulaIngredient o WHERE o._Ingredient_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FormulaIngredient o WHERE o._Accentuate_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FormulaIngredient o WHERE o._AnotherFormula_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FormulaIngredient o WHERE o._Formula_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FilterBySubfamily o WHERE o._SubfamilyTo_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FilterBySubfamily o WHERE o._Subfamily_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM FilterBySubfamily o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Ingredient o WHERE o._FavouriteFormula_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Ingredient o WHERE o._PartOf_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Ingredient o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Report o WHERE o._Ranges_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Report o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM SellerLevel o WHERE o.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM CustomerState o WHERE o._State_id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM CustomerState o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM State o WHERE o.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Formula o WHERE o._Name = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Formula o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM CustomerContactPerson o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM CustomerContactPerson o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Issue o WHERE o._Worker_id = ?1 ORDER BY o.id
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Issue o WHERE o.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge2 o WHERE o.year = ?1 AND o._Delivery_invoice_number = ?2 AND o._Delivery_type_number = ?3 AND o._Delivery_number = ?4 ORDER BY o.year
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge2 o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Vehicle o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o._ZoneNumber = ?1 AND o.number = ?2 AND o._OfficeManager_number = ?3 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o._DefaultCarrier_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o._ZoneNumber = ?1 AND o._MainWarehouse_number = ?2 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Office o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Comment o WHERE o._Issue_id = ?1 ORDER BY o.id
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Shipment o WHERE o._CustomerContactPerson_customer_number = ?1 ORDER BY o._Type, o.mode, o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Shipment o WHERE o.mode = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Shipment o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Shipment o WHERE o._Type = ?1 and o.mode = ?2 and o.number = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryPlace o WHERE o._Customer_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryPlace o WHERE o._PreferredWarehouse_zoneNumber = ?1 AND o._PreferredWarehouse_number = ?2 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Journey o WHERE o._AverageSpeed_oid = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Journey o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ShipmentCharge o WHERE o._Shipment_type = ?1 AND o._Mode = ?2 AND o._Shipment_number = ?3 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ShipmentCharge o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge o WHERE o._Delivery_invoice_year = ?1 AND o._Delivery_invoice_number = ?2 AND o._Delivery_type_number = ?3 AND o._Delivery_number = ?4
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM TransportCharge o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Ranges o WHERE o.oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o._Product_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o._SoldBy_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.oid
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM InvoiceDetail o WHERE o._Invoice_year = ?1 AND o._Invoice_number = ?2 ORDER BY o._ServiceType desc
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o._Warehouse_zoneNumber = ?1 AND o._Warehouse_number = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o._Color_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o._Family_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o._Subfamily_number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o._Formula_oid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product2 o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Size o WHERE o.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o._Warehouse_zoneNumber = ?1 AND o._Warehouse_number = ?2 ORDER BY o._Number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o._DrivingLicence_type = ?1 AND o._DrivingLicence_level = ?2 ORDER BY o._Number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o._Warehouse_zoneNumber = ?1 AND o._Warehouse_number = ?2 AND NOT (o._Number = ?3)
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Carrier o WHERE o._Number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeliveryType o WHERE o.number = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE o._Level_id = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE o._Boss_number = ?1 ORDER BY o.number
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Seller o WHERE o.number = ?1
